ygData.subject: Re: Some Equipment Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Most of the high level monks I know including myself wear obsidian bead hoop earrings from singe in Sol A they have AC and agil (dont remember the stats) +
ygData.messageBody:
Most of the high level monks I know including myself wear obsidian bead hoop
earrings from singe in Sol A they have AC and agil (dont remember the stats)
+ some int.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th previously 47th level (friggin POF is hard on exp)
E-Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: <SkyCitadel@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 19, 1999 12:39 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Some Equipment Questions


> From: SkyCitadel@...
>
> In a message dated 12/18/99 7:59:34 PM Central Standard Time,
> worlord99@... writes:
>
> > I currently use onyx earrings (+2 agi). I want to
> > update this. what should I be looking for
>
> You might consider Gold Topaz earrings. Ac 3 +5 disease resist i think.
>
> >
